00101 /*
00102 The following concern software assistance. For an implementation-determined
00103 software assistance fault or trap to occur (when encountering
00104 denormals MERCED_RTL must be 1. An architecturally-mandated swa
00105 can still occur when MERCED_RTL is 0. Such an assist occurs in frcpa and
00106 fprcpa.
00107 */
